entry.title: Confessions of Continuous Delivery Experts: When GoCD went open source
entry.content: This post is the story of how continuous delivery became critical to the GoCD team’s decision to go open source.

entry.title: Minimizing Risk and Improving Security in DevOps
entry.content: A few tips to help teams start practicing prioritizing security in DevOps.

entry.title: Confessions of continuous delivery experts: How Mingle saw the light
entry.content: This post is about the journey of the Mingle development team from not doing continuous delivery at all to a state where continuous delivery is considered as a routine.

entry.title: Our learnings from Continuous Delivery for Mobile Development
entry.content: This post chronicles a mobile app development team’s journey to continuous delivery, the challenges along the way and how they overcame them.

entry.title: Infographic - What's the difference between Continuous Delivery and Continuous Deployment?
entry.content: The difference between Continuous Delivery and Continuous Deployment is quite simple, but something most people don't understand. Here's an easy way to remember.

entry.title: Architecting for Continuous Delivery - Themes in CD Enablement
entry.content: Continuous Delivery is not just about automating deployments. The goal is to be able to release software reliably and without friction. This post describes the architectural themes to model CD pipelines.

entry.title: Part 5 - CD101: Common Tools for Continuous Delivery
entry.content: CD 101 is a video series to help you get started on your CD journey. In Part 5 we will explore common CD tools.

entry.title: Infographic - Are you ready for Continuous Delivery
entry.content: A handy list of questions about your own people, teams, and organization to determine your readiness for Continuous Delivery.

entry.title: Part 3 - You can’t buy DevOps, but you may need to sell it: Actions to spread DevOps Adoption
entry.content: In part 3 of the series, You can’t buy DevOps but you may need to sell it, we'll explore some of the actions to spread change.

entry.title: Part 4 - CD101: Getting Started with Value Stream Mapping
entry.content: CD 101 is a video series to help you get started on your CD journey. Part Four of this series covers how to get started using value stream mapping.
